Title:
Puccinia chunjii, a close relative of stem rusts revealed by
molecular phylogeny and morphological study
Keywords:
Puccinia graminis, Pucciniales, Basidiomycota,
phylogenetic analysis
Abstract:
A rust specimen on Elymus sp. collected from Gansu
province, China macroscopically closely resembles Puccinia graminis. In
phylogenetic trees based on nrDNA ITS and COI, it is located basal to P.
graminis core clade. Microscopic examination revealed distinct
teliospore morphology compared with P. graminis as well as other
morphologically similar species. Herewith, we designate a name for this
novo lineage, Puccinia chunjii sp. nov..
